org.apache.storm.kafka.spout

クラス KafkaSpoutConfig<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.spout.KafkaSpoutConfig<K,V>
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Serializable

    public class KafkaSpoutConfig<K,V>
extends Object
implements Serializable

    KafkaSpoutConfig defines the required configuration to connect a consumer to a consumer group, as well as the subscribing topics

    関連項目:
    直列化された形式

      static class  KafkaSpoutConfig.FirstPollOffsetStrategy
      The offset used by the Kafka spout in the first poll to Kafka broker.

        public List<String> getSubscribedTopics()
        戻り値:

        public Pattern getTopicWildcardPattern()
        戻り値:
